statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ 3 \\ 2 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ 2 \\ -4 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ 9 \\ -10 \\ -8 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -5 \\ -17 \\ 26 \\ 16 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ -8 \\ 16 \\ 8 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ -3 \\ 3 \\ -1 \end{array}\right]\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
